InstructionData.Title: CO2-Liquefier
InstructionData.Author: Basic IC10 Compiler
InstructionData.Instructions: # Switch on-off and see the pin's names alias gs d0 #l.1 alias pr_in d1 #l.1 alias dv_in d2 #l.1 alias ac d3 #l.1 alias press_v d4 #l.1 alias tank d5 #l.1 yield #l.1 # chamber target # PR Hysteresis # deadband # pressurant in tank # pressure of incoming gas # temperature of incoming gas # pressure in tank # whether or not we're failing to meet T_TARGET # init: s d1 Setting 900 #l.29 # keep headspace at or above minimum, clamped at P_MIN s d4 Setting 620 #l.36 # prep AC cooler s d3 On 1 #l.40 s d3 Mode 0 #l.41 s d3 Setting -28 #l.43 # close feed until condensation window achieved s d2 On 0 #l.46 # main loop # Start: l r3 d0 Pressure #l.51 l r4 d0 Temperature #l.52 l r7 d5 Pressure #l.53 # 1 update control statement # if T_IN <= -55 C AND P_IN < 517 kPa then we risk freezing move r6 0 #l.56 bgt r4 218.15 37 #l.57 bge r3 517 37 #l.58 move r6 1 #l.59 # 2 react to control statement bne r6 1 45 #l.64 s d2 On 0 #l.65 s d3 Mode 0 #l.66 # keep headspace greather than P_MIN s d4 Setting 620 #l.71 sleep 0.2 #l.73 j 79 #l.74 # 3 Maintain feed pressure bge r3 875 49 #l.78 s d1 Setting 900 #l.79 j 51 #l.78 ble r3 925 51 #l.80 s d1 Setting 900 #l.81 # 4 AirCon with symmetric deadband around T_TARGET # turn OFF if T_IN < T_TARGET - BAND # turn ON if T_IN > T_TARGET + BAND # else keep previous mode l r5 d3 Mode #l.88 ble r4 248.15 59 #l.89 s d3 Mode 1 #l.90 j 63 #l.89 bge r4 242.15 62 #l.91 s d3 Mode 0 #l.92 j 63 #l.91 s d3 Mode r5 #l.94 # 5 move r2 0 #l.98 bgt r4 265.15 68 #l.99 blt r3 517 68 #l.100 move r2 1 #l.101 move r1 1 #l.105 blt r7 6000 71 #l.106 move r1 0 #l.107 and r0 r2 r1 #l.110 beqz r0 75 #l.110 s d2 On 1 #l.111 j 76 #l.112 s d2 On 0 #l.113 # Maintain tank headspace pressure s d4 Setting 620 #l.120 sleep 0.2 #l.122 j 28 #l.124 # Compiled at 2025-10-28 19:41 by Exca's Basic10.
